title: Upgrade Your Audio Setup for Under $50!
description: Want to improve your audio quality on a budget? In this video, I reveal my simple yet effective mic setup using the Deity D4 Mini. Check out the links in the description for more details! #AudioSetup #BudgetFriendly #DeityD4Mini
